title: (3430) Carregal do Sal - Arruamento Urbano a Sul da Vila
title_short: (3430) Carregal do Sal - Arruamento Urbano a Sul da Vila
description: Municipal swimming pool parking

address.street: Arruamento Urbano a Sul da Vila

title: (3430-007) Carregal do Sal - 8 Rua Alexandre Braga
title_short: (3430-007) Carregal do Sal - 8 Rua Alexandre Braga
description: Self service laundry. 3 washing machines and 3 dryers

title: (3430-031) Carregal do Sal - 3 Rua Cristos
description: Motorhome rest area with 6 parking spaces (no shadows), new. Near Câmara Municipal (townhall), urban market, Pavilhão de Jogos and the most functional cultural center: hot showers, sinks, Wi-Fi. Fresh water tap is low and near grey waters grid (small). WC discharge is inside toilets building, luxuriously equipped including space for disabled. The city is within walking distance.

title: (3430) Oliveira do Conde - 6 Avenida Estádio Pina Ferraz
title_short: (3430) Oliveira do Conde - 6 Avenida Estádio Pina Ferraz
description: Barbeques, water and tables for eating.

title: (3430) Carregal do Sal - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful nature place at the Mondego river. Swimming possible. Accessible via unpaved road.

title: (3420) Póvoa de Midões - 200 EM635
description: Nice spot along a dirt track, fine for our T5 and wide enough for larger motorhomes. Nice and flat. Walk two mins further for beautiful views across this green valley and the Mondego River.

name: Vale do Fojo
title: (3430-723) Vale do Fojo
description:
A little family camperplace 
Benny and Thérèse are emigrated from Belgium to Portugal and are very lovely people. All 4 camperplaces are paved on stone with grass and individual electrical and water Supply. Swimming pool, toilet and shower is all in the Price. Even your clothes to be washed are all I inclusive.

name: Quinta da Cerca
title: (3420) Quinta da Cerca
description: B & B with breakfast and dinner options. Owners Belgians. Very nice location with beautiful 'Infinity' pool and bar. Accessible only by 4x4 motorhome. The branches of the trees hang low. Serpentines of water through the unpaved road are deep. The slope is 7%. The coordinates are somewhere in the forest. Think twice before you drive up here

title: (3440) Nagozela - 2 Largo Milénio
description: Great parking spot in the village of Nagozela. Flat space for at least 14 big vans. Easy access. Very calm. With tables, barbeques, pinpon table and playground for children. There is a tiny library to exchange books inside a fridge! Very close to the local old school where many workshops are being hosted every week. Including language exchange every first Tuesday of each month at 20:00. Sometimes there are ceramic workshops and so on. Very friendly people open to receive travelers. Local cafe is 50 meters away for a nice coffee in the morning. Local minimarket 80 meters away with a very friendly owner. River beach 20minutes walking distance.

title: (3420-316) Tábua - Vale da Cega
description:
Next to the intermarché pumps, quiet place.
good services, laundry, and some limited spaces to park next to intermarche.

title: (3440-471) Sao Joao de Areias - Estrada Principal
title_short: (3440-471) Sao Joao de Areias - Estrada Principal
description: We offer 5 motorhome pitches with all services. the five pitches differ in length: 12m, 10m, 8m and 6m. The pitches are level and access is good, from a tarmac road. The gate can simply be slid open. Electricity, water, wifi, losing gray water included. You can use your TV satellite dish at any place. Sanitary block available (Toilet and shower). Washing Machine and Dryer available for a small fee. We are also close to the N2 Route. This (route66) of 734km straight through Portugal from Chaves to Faro. Come for your stamp in your route N2 Passport. Free fresh bread rolls from the bakery in the morning. You share the swimming pool and barbecue with the other guests. The estate has fruit trees and grape vines. We speak Dutch, French, English, German and a little Portuguese.

title: (3440) São João de Areias - Estr. Principal
title_short: (3440) São João de Areias - Estr. Principal
description: Next to the football field. Parking lots.

title: (3440) Treixedo - CM1564
description: Nice place to spend the night, close to the water.

title: (3460) Tondela - Rua Nossa Senhora da Esperança
title_short: (3460) Tondela - Rua Nossa Senhora da Esperança
description: Vila Nova da Raiha, Church of Nossa Senhora da Esperanca, wonderful sleeping place with many possibilities to position the van, outside the village and away.

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão -
description: Après avoir essayé sans y parvenir avec notre 7m50, on a trouvé cette carrière qui offre un coin très calme. Plat et très facile d’accès.

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão - CM1564
description: At the edge of the water calm 1 bar restaurant

title: (3420-457) Vila Nova De Oliveirinha - Ov Vale do Ferreiro
title_short: (3420-457) Vila Nova De Oliveirinha - Ov Vale do Ferreiro
description: A family estate is being built here, an independent farm. Not suitable for all vehicles. The driveway is a dirt road with a slope/incline. Only for people who are not afraid/allergic to animals. (Dogs, cats, hens, mules, Garrano foals) There are many installation options. Very good for mountain bikers and hikers. By agreement in the house there is a kitchen and a bathroom. Outdoor kitchen available (pizza oven) in common against payment. Register in advance!

name: Quinta do Retiro
title: (3420) Quinta do Retiro
description: Quinta do Retiro!Small scale campsite with spacious pitches, excellent sanitary and a nice ecological pool.

address.city: Covas e Vila Nova de Oliveirinha (TBU)

title: (3460) Tondela - 100 Rua Cemitério
description: Pretty and quiet parking at the cemetery.

title: (3440-323) Santa Comba Dão - 31 N2
description: Revolution laundry. Prices are all more than written on the front! Bit more expensive than launderettes but supermarkets around and seating next to it!

title: (3440-613) Vimieiro - 2 Largo Estação
description: Large esplanade of the train station. Car parking but where you can be day or night with camper or camper. Here begins the ecopista do Dao, an asphalted and perfectly conditioned cycle path that, after 50 km, reaches Viseu.

title: (3440-303) Santa Comba Dão - 12 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
title_short: (3440-303) Santa Comba Dão - 12 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
description: Quiet place to park and spend the night. Next to the municipal swimming pools. No services

title: (3440-366) Santa Comba Dão - 23 Rua Miguel Neves
title_short: (3440-366) Santa Comba Dão - 23 Rua Miguel Neves
description: Repsol gas station with LPG "AutoGaz"

title: (3460) Tondela - 16 Largo República
description: Camara municipal park of tondela

title: (3440-367) Santa Comba Dão - 5 Rua Outeirinho
description: It is little but a nice place to stay for a couple of vans or small campingcars.Nice view over the river, very close to the  village center.

title: (3440-324) Santa Comba Dão - Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
title_short: (3440-324) Santa Comba Dão - Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Parking next to the Market, supermarket Pingo Doce and Volunteer Firefighters of Sta. Comba Dão.

title: (3460) Tondela - 32 Rua Dr. Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (3460) Tondela - 32 Rua Dr. Manuel de Arriaga
description: Near the urban park and contiguous to the municipal mercado, where we find good bread. Unlimited places in the shade or in the sun. very few cars at night, and very quiet. No parking ban, and walks around. Very clean, so to respect. Rua Johao Mathos Fereira

title: (3460-555) Tondela - 49 Rua Estação
description: At the exit of Tondela by the N2 (road to Canas de S. Maria. Parking of the old station of Tondela on the ecopista do Dāo (greenway south-west of Viseu). Good for cycling, medium for at night (a bit of road noise) A tap open on August 24, 2018, picnic tables, some shade, toilets closed today

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão - 43 Avenida República
description: Land Park, next to the overgrown Coviran

name: Camping Quinta Vale Do Mondego
title: (3525-201) Camping Quinta Vale Do Mondego
description: A small campsite in the making, no facilities yet, but plenty of space to stay with the camper.

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão -
description: Nice lovely place with a good view to the water where you can swim. A pub nearby. The only disadvantage is the noise of the highway nearby.

title: (3460) Tondela - 130 Bairro Ponte
description: River Beach Parking.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estr. Sra. da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estr. Sra. da Ribeira
description: Nice little forest area tucked away, follow the path down a few meters and there's a gorgeous sunset view. Quiet, decent 4g. A few tissues and stuff on the floor unfortunately, but that seems to be everywhere now.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Praça Padre A. T. Dias
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Praça Padre A. T. Dias
description: Very quiet and ideal place to spend a few days. 20 minutes from the pastry shop. We were a night without any problems and far from everything. Without services Idyllic place without a doubt.

name: Pavilhão Desportivo Municipal
title: (3400) Pavilhão Desportivo Municipal
description: Excellent central location in OLIVEIRA DO HOSPITAL town, aside bus station, with full service point and 2 P not shadowed, ideal for visiting the city and shopping. Interesting surroundings (Roman ruins of Bodadela, Mozarabic church of Lourosa, routes of the Alva Valley, route to Santuario Mariano N. Senhora das Preces, iconic Piódão stone village).

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Cool place, with shade, clear water and a beach for swimming. There is even a toilet and a free shower to rinse. 2 parkings to park. The bigger one doesn't have shade. The 2nd that I indicate has some places in the shade. Bar and restaurant on the site.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Very nice space with Aguieira Dam

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Flat parking passed the bars. The road's a bit bumpy but we managed in a 6m motorhome. Easy access to swim a paddle board. Others do pass along the road but it's mainly fishermen or other water users - only occasional vehicles. It is in full sun so maybe too hot in summer but there are a couple of small spots shaded by the trees suitable for campervans. Theres also a huge sloping area going down to the waters edge ideal if you're in more of an off road vehicle or van and dont mind using rocks to level.

title: () - N234
description: Good spot if the other one is full or windy. Not so private as people with boats or fishermen can come, but much easier access and less wind than the other spot nearby.

title: (3420-192) Pinheiro de Coja - 3 Rua da Geralda
title_short: (3420-192) Pinheiro de Coja - 3 Rua da Geralda
description: Mechanic: all kinds of arrangements are made with more than 20 years of experience, you can stay overnight if necessary. They serve you in English, Dutch and Portuguese.

title: (3450) - N234
description: Nature corner at the lake. The access track is good with all types of vehicles. The train goes not far but the noise is not disturbing. Several possible places at the edge of this lake.

name: Camping Toca da Raposa
title: () Camping Toca da Raposa
description: Toca da Raposa is a small and cozy campsite in the foothills of the Serra da Estrela Mountains, Central Portugal. A campers paradise surrounded by nature and the ideal spot for you to explore this beautiful region. Hiking, cycling, horse riding, canoeing, rock climbing,... We offer you a budget friendly staying 80 km from Coimbra, close to Oliveira do Hospital and near the picturesque village Meruge.

title: (3400) Oliveira do Hospital - 4 Loteamento do Margarido
title_short: (3400) Oliveira do Hospital - 4 Loteamento do Margarido
description: Gas station from Intermarché. It is possible to fill with drinking water, just ask at the station, there's also cheap gas and they told us that they will soon have a place to empty grey water too. Supermarket with bakery, cheap meals and laundromat available, you can wash and dry your clothes while shopping or having lunch! Perfect for a pit stop.

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão - Rua Capela
description: Corner in the middle of nature under trees, big storm of wind depending on the weather. Concrete slabs on the ground ideal for an improvised terrace. Access by a dirt road. It goes down well and so it goes back hard. A few people on weekends who come fishing or camping.

title: () - EM517
description: Praia Fluvial do Urtigal on the river Alva (along from free aire) with picnic tables and barbecues. No other services. We moved here as the restaurant at free aire had rave music blasting and wanted a peaceful night, apart from the numerous frogs it was! Road is slightly narrow and overgrown but manageable.

name: Parque do Senhor das Almas
title: () Parque do Senhor das Almas
description: Service station (water supply is explicitly marked that it is NOT drinking water) and motorhomes P (leveled places) just aside EN17 road, also aside trees with shadows; over ten picnic tables with seats; waste disposal; grilling facilities. Drinking water and free electricity also available.

name: School Motorhome Park
title: (3440) School Motorhome Park
description: Park, swimming pool, wi fi, grill...

name: Associação Recreativa e Cultural de Digueifel
title: (3400-753) Associação Recreativa e Cultural de Digueifel
title_short: (3400-753) Associação Recreativa e Cultural de Digueifel
description: 5 new superb parking spaces in the middle of nature. We offer amazing parking spaces near the Rio Alva river. We have a 500 meter "house beach", where you can swim and relax.

address.city: Santa Ovaia e Vila Pouca da Beira

title: (3450) - Unnamed Road
description:
Quiet place with easy access and always near the river. One can take a bath and spend the night.
With a bar where we can eat sandwiches, hamburger, bifana, ice cream and fresh beverages. free Wi-Fi from Bar Cardoso.

title: (3400-368) Avô - N230
description: Picnic area with table and fountain. Beautiful view of the valley

title: () Barril de alva - EM517-1
description: Area with emptying and filling at the edge of the river. The mayor welcomed us very warmly. Small bar restaurant next door and barbecue and bread oven available.

title: (3400) Santa Ovaia - Unnamed Road
description: Space for a vehicle, on a small path, with a great view over the whole valley, we stopped there to eat around 4 p.m. and the nearby road is not a problem, mountain road so little speed

title: (3520-053) Nelas - 4 Rua do Peso
description:
Parking for autocaravans with filling and disposal.
New and clean.

title: (3400-625) Avô - Unnamed Road
description: It is not easy to park in the village of Avô. This place is ample, for parking of heavy vehicles and also accessible to motorhomes of larger dimensions. Fica 200 m from the center. We do not want to go down in the direction of the village. A estradas is open and with difficulty for reversing the march.

title: (3260) -
description: Very quiet place, next to the river. Ample space and with some shadows. There is a restaurant / café / bar next door.

title: (3520-061) Nelas - 20 Avenida da Liberdade
description: Laundromat with wifi and toilet

title: (3520-056) Nelas -
description: Intermarché parking park can stay overnight

title: (3400-382) Avô - 3 Rua Viriato Trágico
description: For shaded parking near a river, quiet noise of the water. Possibility to stay at night

title: (3420) Carapinha - 10 EM524
description: Very quiet, nice places to visit near by

name: A Ponte SECRET GARDEN Camping Park
title: (3400-591) A Ponte SECRET GARDEN Camping Park
title_short: (3400-591) A Ponte SECRET GARDEN Camping Park
description: The campsite has reopened with new owners and new energy! New restaurant with excellent and healthy cuisine. The facilities are also nice and the river is right next to the whole campsite. Clean, fresh. The owners are very friendly and they even offered free yoga classes and movies at night when I was there. All in all a great place for everyone.

title: (3400) - 4 Avenida Principal
description: Swimming at the Alva River with a good drink. Clear, cool water with lots of small fish and dragonflies.  Ideal place for young and old: there is a small beach, stones in the water and a springboard. Lots of shady places. Depending on the weather, the bar is open from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m. At the parking lot you can stay overnight. It can get a bit crowded in summer and especially on weekends.

title: (3360-222) São Paio de Mondego - 13 Rua Ermidas
title_short: (3360-222) São Paio de Mondego - 13 Rua Ermidas
description: parking place

title: (3460) - Rua Linha
description: Dão greenway car park 15 km south-west of Viseu. Former station of Parada de Gonta in a cul-de-sac. Café closed in 2018 from 15/8 to 4/9. 2 empty houses this August 23. Flat parking on bitumen. We can hear the road a bit (IP 3). Interesting for cyclists. Popular restaurant at Farminhāo train station, 3 km towards Viseu. Tap in front of this restaurant (5 km by road).

title: (3520) Nelas - Unnamed Road
description: Parking stadium pequenos, day and night road, to Mangualde college, next to lntermarche and pingo doce

title: (3305-119) Coja - 15 Rua Francisco de Almeida Filipe
title_short: (3305-119) Coja - 15 Rua Francisco de Almeida Filipe
description: Didnt stay for the Night, but very quiet and Nice place for children

title: (3305-150) Coja - 42 Rua Doutor José Albano de Oliveira
title_short: (3305-150) Coja - 42 Rua Doutor José Albano de Oliveira
description: Nice place to Park and Stay the night, Next to the river, restaurants and the Park. Nice and calm place to Stay.

address.street: 42 Rua Doutor José Albano de Oliveira

title: (3305) Coja - Rua Doutor Egas Fafes
description: This place is great in the weekends. During weekdays there is some activity during the day but at night it's also quiet. The parking is level and next to a little park. Mostly suitable for vans. Free water tap.

title: (3450) - IP3
description: Clay, very close to the dam, fairly flat, a bit noisy because of the highway bridge next to it

title: (3305) Coja - Rua Levada
description: Pleasant parking at the edge of the village, near a large landscaped green area and starting from 4 mountain bike trails. Very quiet at night despite the small paved road. free wifi means. shower and toilet open during the day.

title: (3440) Óvoa - Unnamed Road
description:
Possibility to drive to the water with a 4x4.
(Not the path that leads to the bar)

title: (3520) Santar - N231
description: Parking along N231 across the road from a restaurant.  We parked here for the night alongside 2 oil tankers, great as there are no other Parking in the region.  The restaurant offers good and reasonably priced food. It was quite an unforgettable Portuguese night experience with Jorge, the restaurant patron.  Great to spend the night.  River few steps away, road is quite busy but it gets calmer at night.

name: Camping Sao Giao
title: (3400) Camping Sao Giao
description: Sao Giao camping, a very beautiful place, with a nearby river beach.

title: (3360-316) Travanca do Mondego - N228
description:
Parking space next to the dam, beautiful view, flat terrain and waste bin available. At the end of the afternoon / early evening you can hear traffic, but after that it became quiet. In the morning, an employee of the dam parked there, we spent the night there without any problems.
Later we saw that you can also stand underneath if you take the exit just after/before the parking lot. Via 100m off road you come to a flat area with gravel, which is probably a quieter place.

title: (3465-153) Campo de Besteiros - 574 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (3465-153) Campo de Besteiros - 574 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: water tap from a spring. Good access and exit possible. Long vehicles with trailers can also be parked without any problems.

title: (3450-153) Mortágua - Largo São Domingos 4A
description: 3 washing machines and 3 dryers

title: (3305) Pomares - Rua Engenheiro Horácio de Movas
title_short: (3305) Pomares - Rua Engenheiro Horácio de Movas
description: Parking where you can enjoy a beautiful river beach with orchards, very quiet people, super polite and welcoming.

title: (3300) Secarias -
description: Continuing the dirt road (practicable because weeded and cleaned), at the edge of the river, we quickly arrive at a deforested area with 3 or 4 places maximum.

title: (3465-153) Santiago de Besteiros - 67 Rua São Tiago
title_short: (3465-153) Santiago de Besteiros - 67 Rua São Tiago
description: Fairly large parking lot with paved floors. We stopped only to eat but it looks quiet, in a small village at the bottom of the mountain.

title: () Sandomil - EM514
description: Parking along the river beach, with nearby baths and picnic area

title: (3300) Secarias - N342
description: A Praia Fluvial (sandy beach) on the water, near a dam. Possibility to stay overnight. Maximum 2 campers to keep the peace and keep the place. Across the street SUP for rent. (Quinta do Rio Alva) Restaurant within walking distance. Toilets available in July / August. Keep it neat and clean!

title: (3450-228) - 11 Rua Saudade
description: Mortágua - ASA with electricity, water, drain and free wifi and paid vehicle washing point. Park next door, the area is located 500 m from the village center and most shops and services. Important: parking is free for 72 hours, but you must register at the terminal and enter your registration and country of residence. A ticket is issued to be placed behind your windshield. Leave this ASA as clean as when you arrived. Have a good stay !

name: Alboikos Camping Spot
title: (3400-321) Alboikos Camping Spot
description:
A bit of paradise next to Serra da Estrela
Beautiful space next to the Alva River Dam, with calm waters and a small waterfall.
The average temperature in summer is around 35º
It has ample space of about 500m2 where camping is allowed (free of charge during the year 2023), overlooking the river.
The space belongs to an association of river activities and it is possible, if you wish, to make any donation.
It has a toilet complex, but no showers finished yet.
It has access to vehicles with parking for about 50 cars.
On the other side of the arm of the river, it is possible to park motorhomes.
It has a small bar where you can enjoy light meals and drinks. (I recommend the Ham Toast with Serra Cheese)
Water Activities (Kayak, “Seagull”)
Place for recreational fishing.

title: (3300) São Martinho da Cortiça - 54 N17
description: Quiet place for picnics and overnight stays.  Tables, barbecue, water.  Sloping surface, wedges must be underlaid.

title: (3520) Santar -
description:
Really clean (keep it that way!) and quiet place to stop for a break or spend the night at the square near a chapel at the end of a small village. 
Shaded by trees and not much traffic.

title: (3360) Portela - Estrada da Serra
description: Picnic area with parking and tables.

title: (3510) - Unnamed Road
description: In addition to a chapel from 1678 and renovated in 2006, a square, BBQ building and children's playhouse. On a hill so it can be windy but enough space to find a sheltered spot. At 100m from a 4/5G mast

title: (6270-555) Torrozelo - 5 Avenida da Beira
description:
Park near street but calm. 
WATER FREE
Nice to sleep!

title: (3475-031) - ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (3475-031)  - ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: Car park of a former closed public establishment and of a former club. Flat and tarred place, easy access by N230 or N230. 3. Shops at 350 m, Museum and toilets at 200 m. Quiet and safe place, calm night. On the passage of a short hike loop (PR1) of 7.4 km to discover the environment of Caramulo. Breathtaking view over the plain.

address.street: ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga

title: (3305) - N344
description: Nice picnic area with plenty of shade and beautiful views of the valley. It has a natural water source.

title: (3475-031) Caramulo - Rua Jean Lucart
description: Nice village with typical shops, very quiet, 120 m from the Coimbra Museum.

title: (3475) - 100 Rua Outeirinho
description: Water tap can be easily approached with campers. According to the label, it is not controlled drinking water. According to information from the villagers, it is spring water. Here in town water is bottled and sold. Nearby behind the sports bar it has a gray and black water disposal.

title: (3475) - Unnamed Road
description: A small uneven parking lot for hikers at 1006m altitude on the road just below the summit of Caramulinho (1075 m). There is a large trash can and picnic table with a great view. Fire is forbidden and please respect the fauna and flora. A really quiet place with no through traffic. An approximately 8 km (approx. 2.5 h) long circular hiking trail also begins.

name: Parque Municipal de Campismo de Arganil
title: (3300) Parque Municipal de Campismo de Arganil
title_short: (3300) Parque Municipal de Campismo de Arganil
description:
Small campsite with basic facilities. 
Very nice environment near river Alva.
Access to tents, caravans and motorhomes.
Green parcels and some shade.

title: (3500) São João de Lourosa - A25
description: Fuel Station with free water in pump number #6, has a little of everything: playground, picnic tables, recycling garbage, electric car charge, ATM restaurant and Wi-Fi. Time limit to park and sleep 72 hours.

title: (6270) Sazes da Beira - EM514-1
description: Great place for the night next to the football field. Not suitable for large motorhomes. Nice view all around. Quiet night, we saw no one or heard.

title: (3500) São João de Lourosa - EM594
description:
Free toilets, outdoor showers, childplay area,
nice river walk.

I'm here in March and its closed, maybe due to Coronavirus.

the parking nearby is for cars only.

title: (3305) - Avenida Doutor Mário Mathias
description: Large esplanade next to the natural pool. Quiet zone. With picnic area in front and drinking water nearby

title: (3305) Benfeita -
description: Free parking spot in village for small vans. Sound of river, free drinking water and open free toilet right next to car park. Free open village WiFi too. Cool mountain town

title: (3305) Benfeita - CM1350-1
description: Free allowed parking place next to a dirt track. Not completely flat. Very quiet, no passing traffic. Right next to a small church with shaded places, water and trashbins. 10min walk to the village of Benfeita, 20min to the beautiful Fraga Da Pena waterfalls.

title: (6270-644) Vila Cova à Coelheira - N1 Rua da Carreira
title_short: (6270-644) Vila Cova à Coelheira - N1 Rua da Carreira
description: River beach with bar almost always open. Next to the bar there is a tree-lined area where it is possible to stay for free. The area is very nice and quiet.

title: (3300) - 2 Estrada Principal
description:
River beach just off the main road by a bridge. Plenty of parking suitable for campers, great sitting area under trees in the shade. Toilet facilities and an outdoor shower. Also a play park for kids. Quiet, peaceful spot. 
New cafe/bar (Passo e Fico) is open with amazing food and drinks and ready to give you the best tips to look around.
Pass here and enjoy life. ❤️

title: (6285) Vide - 11 Avenida Asdrubal de Almeida Dias
title_short: (6285) Vide - 11 Avenida Asdrubal de Almeida Dias
description: Easy parking. Filling point of the water. Beautiful bridge

title: (3500) Bairro da Misericórdia - 4A Rua Príncipe Perfeito
title_short: (3500) Bairro da Misericórdia - 4A Rua Príncipe Perfeito
description: Prince Perfeito Sports Center parking lot

title: (3360-249) São Pedro de Alva -
description: New Motorhome Area. Many places. Close to the river beach of Vimieiro. With restaurant. Very beautiful!! Supermarket Casa Videira in the centre of the São Pedro de Alva village, at 15 min driving (IC6 road). WC near the river beach. Very quiet and safe. Attention! Do not drive through villages where the passage can be very narrow!! access only via the IC6 road!!

title: (3360) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice parking spot. Adorable Swimming spot. Small and cheap Resto/snackbar. Lifeguards, watermill, toilets. Good spot to start a walk (2hours or 4hours). Very quit to sleep. Dogs aloud on terras not on the beach.

title: (3300-045) Arganil -
description: Park near the central area of Arganil. Quiet and ideal for spending a day or spending the night.

title: (6285) Vide - CM1134
description: It is not easy to park AC at Vide. We spent 3 nights in this place, with no problems. Although it is next to the road, it is not very busy. The center of Vide is 200 m away. There are two places closer to the side of the road.

title: (3300) Arganil - EM523
description:
Service area at an intermarche gas station.
All services free.
Also, cheaper fuel than anywhere else seen so far. 
There is a big parking lot right next to the gas station.

title: (6270) Seia - Avenida Terras de Sena, n.º 121
title_short: (6270) Seia - Avenida Terras de Sena, n.º 121
description: Lidl with a large car park next to a stream.

title: (3300-016) Arganil - 18 Rua Olivença
description: Intermarché supermarket parking lot.  Allowed overnight in the dirt part of the parking lot.  Good location for visiting the city

title: (3305) Benfeita - EM518
description: PEDESTRIAN ACCESS “CASCADA FRAGA DA PENA”. The only access point to the path that leads to the waterfall, which is very pretty. ATTENTION! The route is about 2.5 KMS but with a medium/high difficulty. If you manage to do it, the road is spectacular. LEAVE THE ENVIRONMENT AS YOU FOUND IT. Greetings

title: (3360) Penacova - Unnamed Road
description: A place next to an old burned down villa. A nice discovery very quiet for the night!

title: (6285) - N338
description: Place next to or on the ground floor to rest or spend the night

title: (6270-534) Seia - 81 EM512
description: local supermarket

title: (6270) Seia - 25 N231
description: Muito Menos, there are laundry machines (self service) on the parking lot and Muito Menos sells Campingaz  in different bottle sizes.

title: (6270-448) Seia - 4 Rua da Castanheira
description: Small car park and AC, 3 or 4. Tiled, without services, 900 m to the center but uphill. Next to Repsol gas station

title: (6270) Cabeça -
description: Magnificent spot between Piodao and Loriga in the Sa Serra Estrella natural park.Small dirt road but passable and flat.Small area to land ideally located a few steps from a viewpoint and the sunset. ATTENTION place cleaned by my little hands (gloved) because really very dirty, full of toilet paper so please keep this place clean for the following because the spots are rare in this sector.

title: (6270) Valezim - Rua do Bairro das Cortes
title_short: (6270) Valezim - Rua do Bairro das Cortes
description: Nice large parking for the church under the mighty large trees. Drinking water available but currently not in use.

title: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
description: Quiet place to spend the night, around a beautiful pond. Stone table fitted on site. Easy access path in a non-4x4 VW van. A couple came by around 9 p.m. walking their dog, he greeted us kindly, and continued on his way without reproaching us.

title: (3305) Benfeita - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area in front of a closed forest house from 17:00 to 08:30. Paved road to get there. Large round table and litter bins. Cool in the woods. Very very quiet.

title: (6270) São Romão -
description: This is the public park of a supermarket. Grocery shopping right next door. Calm, quiet and safe place (cctv in the parking and police nearby) to spend the night. Perfect place to have breakfast and buy some local cheeses and wines.

title: (6270) Cabeça -
description: On the same road to Piodao, a viewpoint with spectacular views, surrounded by nature, but without any service. We spent the night alone, but super quiet, and a sky with thousands of stars. Highly recommended.

title: (3305-226) Moura da Serra -
description:
Place in the middle of the mountains by the quiet road at night.

There are a few picnic tables.

Several possible locations but only one very flat location.

Place that helped us out in the middle of the night fog!

title: (6270-481) Seia - 86 Avenida Doutor Afonso Costa
description: Only parking

title: (6270) Seia - Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata
title_short: (6270) Seia - Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata
description:
Oficial place for motorhomes without services. 
Prohibited on wednesday because of street Market.

address.street: Rua Doutora Ester da Cunha Barata

title: (3500-046) Viseu - 276 Rua Cruzeiro
description:
It's a nice place to park or sleep.
It's side by a shopping Palacio de Gelo.
Can go to a shopping walk.
Large space to park motorhomes or sleep.
Not have amenities but in mall you have food, wc and wifi.

title: (3400) Aldeia das Dez -
description: Beautiful spot on 1030m. The mountains are green and a lot of flowers with beautiful rock formations. You are in between windmills but you hardly hear them. There is wind here so if there are windy days in this area I can imagine here its too windy. Internet connection is very good. This spot is a little more hidden than the other one close by.

title: (6270) Seia - 50 Rua Primeiro de Dezembro
description: Free park close to the city hall. Perfect to visit the city and even to spend the night. Close street with little traffic.

title: (3350) Lavegadas - R. Portela do Carvalho
description: Magnificent free motorhome area (under construction?) with picnic table, swing, barbecue & water tap! Incredible view of the river! Clay, a little sloping on the other hand. Stony path to get there but ok in CC of 7m40!

title: (6270) Seia - 33 Rua da Esplanada dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (6270) Seia - 33 Rua da Esplanada dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Roadside parking with a lovely view. Relatively busy road, on an incline. There are public toilets about 50m along the road.

address.street: 33 Rua da Esplanada dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (3305) Arganil - EM508
description: Very beautiful view of the valley, a place difficult to access but possible by car and van taking all precautions!

title: (3510) Viseu -
description: Laundromat. Excellent service Portuguese, French and English spoken. Very clean. Self service. Cheap. Beside a cafe. Easy to park

title: (6285) - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of a forest road, on the heights of Piodao. No service, quiet place, view of the pretty village of Piodao

title: (3500-401) Viseu - 244 Rua dos Almeida Furtado
description: Lavaplus - Laundry Self Service. Opens 7am and closes 12am

title: (6270) Seia - 9 Avenida Doutor Sebastião Costa
description: Great free parking with superb views

title: (6270) Seia - 22 Avenida Dona Alexandrina F. Albergaria
title_short: (6270) Seia - 22 Avenida Dona Alexandrina F. Albergaria
description: nice quiet spot - very close to town center. Good leveling.

title: (6285) Piodão - CM1134
description: Small parking along the road. Convenient when the village is complete

title: (6270) Seia - 4-16 Rua de Santana
description: Parking of the bread museum (pão?). Many places, no service, slightly sloping, very quiet, free, there is another car park just below. It's pretty and lined with a small wood. !!WARNING!! Access can be complicated because the road is very steep and some turns very tight !! We went in 1st and with good brakes with Citroën jumper well loaded ..

title: (6270-021) Cabeça - 3 Avenida da Independência da Freguesia
title_short: (6270-021) Cabeça - 3 Avenida da Independência da Freguesia
description: Never go through "Muro", the road is bad, not good for "We". We went to see the Christmas village of Cabeça and at the beginning of the road that leads there, there is a sign that says it is temporarily closed and therefore, cross it, no worries! It is a sloping ground! It is 500 m from the city but it is very quiet! And there is an incredible view!

title: (6270) - N231
description: Space for about 10 vehicles next to dirt track that runs parallel to the road. Accessible road for any vehicle with a little care. There are no services or tables, just below there is a pool.

title: (3300) - EM508
description: Arrived with Van California 4x4, probably also for non-ideal campers, a nice place on a stretch that leads to wind turbines, but a poor enough telephone network. Close to Piodao, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and other beautiful villages like Benfeita.

title: (3505-390) Viseu -
description:
Helped us switch our Swedish gas bottle for a Portuguese one, complete with adapter to fit our car. Very helpful and friendly staff. 
Muito obrigado!

title: (3305) - EM508
description: Plots full nature at the top of the superb pass view on the valleys no passage possibility of sleeping

title: (3505) Viseu -
description: Intermarché Service Area

title: (3530) Mangualde -
description:
Parking lot of a disused soccer field. Flat, calm, relatively clean and possibility of shade.
No services. Access by dirt road in rather poor condition, but passable for van and van.
not perfect but excellent troubleshooting because few spots in the area.

title: (3360) Miro - Rua Barca
description: Parking overlooking a small valley very quiet.

title: (6285) Piodão - CM1134
description: Great views next to the village

title: (6285) Piodão - Unnamed Road
description:
Possibility to park on the side of the road in the bend for 3 van type vehicles. Little slope. 3 min from the swimming pool (cold mountain water) where there is WC and shower and 5 min from the village on foot.
Very little traffic at night. View of the village. Very difficult road for motorhomes.

title: (6285) Piodão - Travessa Eduardo Filipe
description:
Few places by the roadside, we stayed a very good night, without any problem, the roads to get there are very difficult for large vehicles.
good place to visit or spend the night.

title: (3303) Piodão - Largo Cónego Manuel Fernandes Correia
title_short: (3303) Piodão - Largo Cónego Manuel Fernandes Correia
description: No facilities but have a chance to visit one the beautiful medieval village UNESCO World Heritage

title: (3500-151) Viseu - 6 Avenida José Relvas
description: Municipal swimming pool shower, ask at the reception

title: (6285) - Avenida Comissão de Melhoramento do Piódão
title_short: (6285)  - Avenida Comissão de Melhoramento do Piódão
description: Lovely view from the parking into the town. Only fits 3/4 caravans. We went in the evening and it was empty. Don’t recommend before 17:00.

address.street: Avenida Comissão de Melhoramento do Piódão

title: (3500-151) Viseu - 6 Avenida José Relvas
description: Lots of parking close to the sport area. quiet. close to the forest too and to the hostel. maybe they allow you to shower?

title: (3500-048) Viseu - 144 Rua Arco
description: Huge car park, Monday and Wednesday but market day

title: (3500) Viseu - PT Avenida Capitão Homem Ribeiro
title_short: (3500) Viseu - PT Avenida Capitão Homem Ribeiro
description: In the absence of places in the nearby ASA, there is this place where you can go to night.

title: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
description: São João do Monte. Large parking next to a park with trees. Tables, BBQ, water (tap on the speaker on the parking side). Main interest: nice little river bath well equipped (WC and showers open today) 100 m below. Between Àgueda and Tondela (southwest of Viseu). Disadvantage: 25 km of winding road (N 230) Easier access by exit 12 of the A 25 (Campia).

title: (3510- 073) Viseu - Avenida Capitao Homem Ribeiro 199
description: 8 places on tarmac. Waste bins, gray water drain, free water with tap, two bins with tap, toilet door. FON Wi-Fi point nearby. Not far downtown and funicular.

title: (3500) Viseu - Rua Doutor Aristides Sousa Mendes
title_short: (3500) Viseu - Rua Doutor Aristides Sousa Mendes
description: Very quiet place with camping table and trees. And there is a water point

title: () Viseu - Avenida Emídio Navarro
description: Ample parking

title: (3500) Viseu - 110 Rua Arrabalde
description: Huge parking near the old town very quiet.

title: () Viseu - Rua Fonte
description: Parking on paved street, very quiet, next to a nice natural park. No service, ideal for one night.

title: (6270) Loriga - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic spot on the way up to the top. Great views down below towards the west with amazing sunset Sheltered from the north wind. Tables, water and bins provided. Very quiet road at night, no traffic at all.

title: (3300) - EM544
description: Great picnic stop several places for parking possibility of sleeping for 1 or 2 camper table to eat view on the valley

title: (3300) Pombeiro da Beira - Unnamed Road
description: Igreja Santa Quitéria (santuário).

title: (6270) Loriga - Unnamed Road
description: Place in nature for picnics or for the night. Amazing views.

title: (6270) Seia - 6270 N339
description: Water point named in the post in the car park next door but to be able to locate it easily. Drinking water recommended by the local shepherd!

title: (6270) Seia - Rua da Eira
description: Semi stabilized area, shaded, away from the road and overlooking the valley. The view is exceptional at 180 °. Picnic tables, no service but optimal satellite and 4G reception. A nice place for a cool bivouac! Be careful, however, to the possible nuisance caused by the kennel located at about fifty meters.

title: (3360) Penacova - IP3
description: Great place to spend the night coming out of the IP3 easy access by van or 4x4 the path has some ruts.

title: (3500) Abraveses - 20 Bairro São João das Lameiras
title_short: (3500) Abraveses - 20 Bairro São João das Lameiras
description:
Ample parking on the outskirts of viseu.
Flat and with a supermarket, Burger King and Leroy Merlin next door.
Quiet and without services, but the motorhome area 1 km away

title: (3510) Viseu - Estrada Florestal de Mozelos
description: There's not one specific spot, it's a nice forest where we believe you could park anywhere, it's full off spots, some of them would require a good ground clearance such as 4×4 vehicle, but some  spots are reachable with a simple CC

title: (6270) Loriga - R. de São Sebastião
description: Very pleasant parking  in front of a cemetery and small chapel! Very shady under big trees and with a great view of the village of Loriga and all its assets. Is frequented by local residents.

title: (3330) Colmeal -
description: There was nothing nearby that made us stop here. Very quiet during the night the occasional car. we have an 8.5 meter camper.

name: Parque Campismo Municipal de Penacova
title: (3360) Parque Campismo Municipal de Penacova
description: It is a nice park, small and quiet, with good shadows and a beautiful view of the Mondego river. It is closed for renovation

title: (3515-114) Viseu - 39 Avenida Aquilino Ribeiro
description: Clean and Airy Laundry outside of Viseu.  Free WIFI too. Parking ample parking on road. Open 7 days a week

title: (6270-102) Loriga - 1 Rua do Porto
description: Regato Park. In front of the school. Area for 4 motorhomes. Water filling and emptying services. Sewage too. It is new and unfinished.

title: (6270) Loriga - Avenida Padre António R. A. Prata
title_short: (6270) Loriga - Avenida Padre António R. A. Prata
description: Parking place right in front of the school. Recommended to us by the people at the fire department. It's easy to get there and it very close to the centre. There is room for 4/5 camping cars. Loriga is a wonderful village with very friendly people and amazing river pools! Great for kids!

address.street: Avenida Padre António R. A. Prata

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: Nice spot next to the river and his waterfall so we don’t here the road. Nice view over Ponte. Lots of place all the long of the road

title: (3360) Penacova - 8 N235
description: Road next to the river, after a detour with a sign of fishing area. The road is dirt but easy to access and comfortable. At the end of the road, there is a large space that can accommodate 3 or 4 vans. The place is ideal to spend the night with a fabulous view of the city

title: (3350) Venda Nova -
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks. Lots of tables available

title: (3360) Penacova - N2
description: Trail running centre, car park with bar at the top, building below with free showers and toilets, motorcycle washing station, very pretty viewpoint and beautiful hikes to do in the surroundings, beach and picnic tables.

title: (6270) Loriga - N231
description: Secondary parking park in Loriga (ex. Soccer field). Boas views local sossegado with enough space. Perto da praia fluvial. Optimal to passar a noite. A little acidentate access.

name: ASA Mangualde
title: (3530) ASA Mangualde
description:
We stayed one night at the above location and all ASA signage is still in place. Even in the village we find signposts that lead us there.
We used the free electricity and carried out gray water disposal.

title: (3450) Moura - N234
description: Hidden in the trees, perfect for the night, free, no service.

title: (6270) Loriga -
description:
At the foot of the watchtower, a magnificent place with a superb view.
Let's stay discreet and let's not spoil nature.

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: Great spot for a night calm beautiful views

title: (6270) Loriga - N231
description:
Only 2 or 3 places to stop the camper !
To get the place you need to go at night !
It´s the special place that everyone wants !
5O meters from the river beach of Loriga !
On the river beach you have :
-toilet 
-trash cans 
And you are at 500meters from village center .

title: (6270) Seia -
description: Path perpendicular to the small road that leads to the n339 road in the direction of sabugeiro. Extremely quiet. No services. Very beautiful view

title: (6270) Loriga - N231
description: great place for a motorhomes, near to Loriga river beach.

title: (3350) - EM554
description: Place at the top of a small mountain, in a part of the forest that is being planted (take care). Wooden picnic tables and a small water tap (right next to the tables). Calm and serenity guaranteed! We met the rangers who told us we could stay!

title: (3300) - EM543
description: Parking at the top of a mound, at the entrance of Cepos (village hall), toilets nearby, lost in the mountains

title: () Penacova - 2 N2
description: Parking snack of the campsite. Feet in the water and calm for the night. Right just after the cemetery.

title: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
title_short: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
description: Parking spaces opposite children's playground and picnic tables.

address.street: 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo

title: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
title_short: (3530) Mangualde - 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
description: P back of the church“Nossa Senhora do Castelo”, on top of high hill. There are 2 picnic tables and much more a little lower. You can walk a lower road around the church with beautiful views over valley, Mangualde city, and several mountains (including Serra da Estrela). Located below is a large children's playground, a bar / restaurant and other parking facilities.

address.street: 53 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo

title: (3530) Mangualde - 22 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
title_short: (3530) Mangualde - 22 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo
description: Parking lot of the church “Nossa Senhora do Castelo” which lies on top of hill; shaded, quiet and peaceful… and extended panorama.

address.street: 22 Rua de Santa Maria do Castelo

name: Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
title: (3360) Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
title_short: (3360) Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
description: Park of Campismo de Penacova da FMCP. Super simple camping but nickel, impeccable health, near the river and a small beach, owners very friendly French speaking, idyllic

title: (3360) Penacova - E801
description: Excellent spot for parking with public toilets without the need to leave the main road.

title: (6270) São Romão - N339
description: Large gravel parking at the edge of the road. Great view, fantastic sunset. The sunrise is not bad either! You can easily get off the road. No service. Let's stay clean!

title: (3330) Góis - CM1361
description: Praia fluvial das Canaveias! Beautiful spot on the Ceira river, water, toilets, bar, sandy beach, overlooking the charming village of VN do Ceira. Spent several nights without problems

title: (3360) Penacova - 4 Rua Carreira
description:
Parking by the main road (20 meters), going through the village. Space for 4 ACs. We will spend the night here because we could not find a safe/accessible way to get to the spot registered nearby (by the river bank).
It's now close to 21h, in November, and there are only a few cars and a few trucks driving by. 
It's pretty dark. A few orange lights on the road but not very bright.
It will be just fine for the night, despite a dog barking in the background. 
Doesn't seem to be any kind of services.

title: (3360) Penacova - 1 Avenida João Antonio Gomes
description: Penacova, charming village with permanent and free area outside the cities and the coast. Easy access from Coimbra with beautiful landscapes. CAUTION DIFFICULT ACCESS THROUGH THE TOP OF THE CITY, DO NOT FOLLOW THE "AIRO DE SERVICIO" BURNING BUT GO TO THE FIRE STATION FROM THE BASE OF THE CITY, THE AREA IS NEAR!
